articles.title: AWS and NVIDIA Extend Collaboration to Advance Generative AI Innovation - NVIDIA Blog
articles.description: Amazon Web Services (AWS), an Amazon.com company, and NVIDIA today announced that the new NVIDIA Blackwell GPU platform—unveiled by NVIDIA at GTC 2024—is coming to AWS.
articles.content:
